General.Name: XTPL SA
General.Description: XTPL S.A. develops additive manufacturing technology for ultra-precise printing of nanomaterials in Poland and internationally. The company offers XTPL delta printing system and nano inks. Its technology is used in display, semiconductor, advanced PCB, anticounterfeiting, and biosensor applications. The company sells its products through distributors. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Wroclaw, Poland.

0.Name: Dr. Filip  Granek
0.Title: Co-Founder, Pres of the Management Board & CEO
